item.title: JPMorgan upgrades this beaten-down industrial salt stock, says it's primed for a major turnaround
item.description: Analyst Jeffrey Zekauskas upgraded the stock to overweight from neutral.

item.title: Morgan Stanley upgrades this chipmaker, sees it rallying more than 20%
item.description: Analyst Joseph Moore upgraded the stock to overweight from equal weight.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves premarket: CVS, Super Micro Computer, Meta Platforms and more

item.title: Big Super Bowl betting coupled with underdog Eagles win to boost DraftKings bottom line, says Bank of America
item.description: Sports betting company Draftkings could see gains ahead thanks to the Super Bowl and Philadelphia Eagles' victory, according to Bank of America.

item.title: Morgan Stanley's Jonas says keep buying Tesla as it's the best way to play the AI transformation of manufacturing
item.description: Tesla is the most diversified company developing intelligent machines that will transform manufacturing, according to Morgan Stanley.
